channel.description: Centralize your users with Universal Directory Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 692 Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Changes to be made: Title change Pull out only the material relevant to Universal Directory Links to original docs: Identity management factors: https://developer.okta.com/docs/concepts/iam-overview-identity-management-factors/ Page type: Concept
